question:
A foreign friend of your plans to visit your place and stay with you, but you do not have time on that date. Give your friend another alternate date to come.

In your letter, you should:
apologize for it
explain what you will busy for on that date
suggest to him/her alternate time to come
text: I hope you are pink in your health. Today I received your email and I feel glad to hear that you are coming to India  next Friday to complete your research on our national culture which is a part of your study. I am writing this letter to apologize to you due to the fact that, unfortunately, next week I ought to go  outside  my home.

I would like to explain to you that recently I had apply for a job and yesterday I received an interview confirmation email from the organization. Consequently, I will go to attend this work interview and it will take at least 2-3 days for the entire process as per company policy.

As you know that this is my dream job as well as I want to become an employee of this organization for a long time at the same time I do not want to skip the opportunity to help you during your research which is essential for you. As a result, I am requesting you that please postpone your scheduled plan in light of the fact that you are not aware of my city and it will be hard for you to complete your task.
I await a favourable response from you.
